name: Walter Jr: The Game
description:
An unofficial Breaking Bad fangame by cbcaexceptnot.

You play as Walter Jr and fight various enemies(its pretty short lol).

Better Call Saul DLC is available soon.

All asset rights go to the creators.

dev --> https://www.deviantart.com/cbcaexceptnot

Sony owns Breaking Bad(not me)

Other credits are in readme.txt
